CmdLine: echo "deb http://apt.postgresql.org/pub/repos/apt/ jessie-pgdg main" > /etc/apt/sources.list.d/pgdg.list   && wget --quiet -O - https://www.postgresql.org/media/keys/ACCC4CF8.asc | apt-key add -   && curl -sL https://deb.nodesource.com/setup_8.x | bash -   && apt-get update -qq && apt-get install -y postgresql-client-9.6 nodejs python-pip   python-dev groff locales --no-install-recommends
Commands.Name: run
